title: My Profile's Website
description: This project is the showcase of my past experiences and achievements.

title: AI Chatbot
description: The project is a custom AI chatbot application using the OpenAI API, designed to learn full-stack development by handling user commands, integrating with a third-party service, and delivering results to users.

title: Tip Calculator App
description: The project involves creating a simple JavaScript calculator to practice input handling and user interaction logic, with a focus on learning and problem-solving through trial and error.

title: Time Tracking Dashboard
description: The project focused on practicing CSS Grid and dynamically switching timeframes using JSON data, with React hooks for state management. Challenges in styling and state handling were addressed through design adjustments in Figma and applying knowledge from prior lessons.

title: Newsletter Sign-up Form With Success Message
description: The project involved building a form with validation, submission, and a success state, focusing on DOM manipulation and navigation between pages. Challenges with event handling were addressed through documentation and trial-and-error, enhancing development skills.

title: Article Preview Component
description: The project involved developing an article preview component with animated sharing icons, emphasizing layout and interactivity. Using vanilla JavaScript instead of modern frameworks added complexity, particularly in functionality, styling, and the build process, but it provided valuable learning and insights.

title: Meet Landing Page
description: The project focused on improving layout skills with responsive design and mobile-first principles using HTML and CSS. Challenges with HTML structure required frequent adjustments, providing valuable experience in managing complexity.

title: Testimonials Grid Section
description: The project involved practicing CSS Grid to manage layouts and adjust elements using span and map. It was completed efficiently, building proficiency through practice and application of learned techniques.

title: Four Card Feature Section
description: The project focused on creating multi-column and responsive layouts using Flexbox and CSS Grid, addressing challenges in understanding these techniques. It was completed successfully, resulting in a layout resembling a real-world website.

title: Product Preview Card Component
description: The project involved improving skills in handling complex elements and building responsive designs using a mobile-first approach and SCSS. Challenges in responsive design were addressed through SCSS for image adaptation and mobile-first techniques.

title: Recipe Page
description: The project focused on writing semantic HTML to create a recipe page with a complex structure. The main challenge was managing different sections, which was resolved by grouping related elements to simplify the layout and ensure responsiveness.

title: Social Links Profile
description: The project involved creating a personalized social link-sharing profile to showcase various social profiles, with a focus on CSS and Flexbox. Challenges in replicating the design were overcome by analyzing and adjusting styles using the inspect tool.

title: Blog Preview Card
description: The project focused on practicing fundamental HTML and CSS concepts, such as HTML structure and the box model. Despite challenges with the complex design, it was successfully broken down into manageable steps, building real-world web elements and boosting confidence in the skills.

title: QR Code Component
description: The project introduced HTML and CSS by creating a static card layout, incorporating React with Bootstrap and ensuring responsiveness across devices. It provided a solid foundation for more efficient and refined projects in the future.
